title: Russian forces escalate attacks on Ukraine's civilian areas - The Associated Press - en Español
content:
1. Russian forces escalate attacks on Ukraine's civilian areas  The Associated Press - en Español
  2. Kharkiv surrounded by Russian troops; Zelenskyy calls out Russian "state terrorism" | USA TODAY  USA TODAY
  3. Putin's 40 miles of killing machines taunt Ukraine's capital: LIVE UPDATES  Fox News
  4. Bombing and fighting in Ukraine's capital Kyiv - BBC News  BBC News
  5. Russia's 40-mile convoy appears to have bogged down 15 miles from Kyiv; shells pound Ukrainian city of Kharkiv. Live updates.  USA TODAY
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — Russian forces escalated their attacks on crowded urban areas Tuesday, bombarding the central square in Ukraine’s second-biggest city and Kyiv's main TV tower in what the country's president called a blatant campaign of terror.
